body.name: KN95 Adjustable Masks 30 Pack, Individually Wrapped Disposable Respirator Masks with Adjustable Ear Loops
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 6% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 51 mins
features: Fabric type 5-Layer, two layers of non-woven cloth, two layers of melt-blown fabric,one layer of hot air cotton

High-quality Material: Our KN95 masks are made with a combination of non-woven fabric and hot air cotton, ensuring durability and comfort. The 3D design provides a better fit and snugly contours to the face for enhanced protection.

Superior Protection: With a 5-layer design, our masks offer a filtration efficiency of ≥95%, effectively filtering out airborne particles. Each mask features an adjustable earloop with a secure fastener, allowing for a customized and secure fit for people of different face sizes.

Individually Packaged: Each mask is individually packaged, making it convenient to carry and ensuring hygiene and health. Whether you're at the airport, supermarket, construction site, or school, our masks are suitable for a wide range of crowded environments.

Nose-friendly Design: The mask is equipped with a sponge pad at the nose bridge, providing a comfortable and secure fit while preventing fogging of glasses. Say goodbye to discomfort and blurred vision!
Disclaimer: This KN95 mask is NOT an N95 mask. For more information about KN95 masks please see the following before you purchase: amazon.com/AboutKN95s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adjustable strap makes all the difference
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling to wear my traditional KN95 masks and was so happy to find this one with adjustable ear loops! They make all the difference in having a mask that fits well and doesn't pull on my ears too much. The foam at the nose area is a nice touch as well, although it still leaves redness on the bridge of my nose after wearing it all day. Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Enough room to breathe and adjustable straps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-quality disposable masks
reviews.reviewText: With recent spike in corona cases, I decided to get these masks. The masks are very comfortable and breathable, and they have a nose clip that helps to seal the mask around the nose. The ear loops are also adjustable and do not hurt my ears after wearing them for a long time. The masks are individually wrapped which is very convenient and hygienic. They are made of five layers of non-woven fabric and have a filtration efficiency of 95% or higher. I have used these masks for grocery shopping, going to the doctor, and visiting some friends, and I feel very safe and confident wearing them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for lipstick and talking, glasses wearing
reviews.reviewText: Got these to have extra/keep grab and go options in the car and luggage, just don’t want to be caught out if I or my family needs these, especially while traveling/ if something else comes along and overnight we all need full time masking (or any trips to the ICU - got viral meningitis after the last ICU visit). Usually I like to use my cute mask with a filter installed and then a plastic thing that keeps the mask from closing on my lipstick or bumping while I talk, which is a lot but I still have filters for them. These are great, easy to adjust, seems to close/able to adjust on my nose, doesn’t interfere with my glasses, doesn’t mess with my lipstick/gloss, or while talking (so far, haven’t done a whole 8 hour day), feels comfortable on my ears and face, and doesn’t look weird with the center fold. Honestly thought I would still need the plastic thing I got to keep my lipstick/talking protected, especially since these fold so compactly to fit into luggage/a pouch under my car seat, but no these are a one and done option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this mask for quick trips to the store. It's soooo easy to put on & fit - the nose wire and foam strip at the top make customizing easy. The earloops are also adjustable for a tighter fit. & It's waay more breathable than my previous quick trip mask, a cloth over surgical mask. The black color, of course, goes with everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, adjustable face masks
reviews.reviewText: With all the people sick this winter It makes sense to mask up when in crowded indoor settings. These adjustable face masks are comfortable come with a cushioned nose bridge rest and an adjustable strap give you greater granularity to secure the mask to your face and seal up any air leaks along the perimeter. So you no longer have to knot up the straps to secure the mask to your face. The adjustable metal nose grip is malleable and easy to wrap around the bridge of the nose and the inner portion is foam cushioned. I recently wore it at a holiday party for several hours. and it was comfortable, so I am highly recommending these KN95 face masks. Each of the 30 masks are individually packed in a plastic sleeve and separate making it more hygienic for distribution or for self-retrieval.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best fitting easiest to adjust masks I’ve found.
reviews.reviewText: The Semask KN95 Adjustable Masks 30 Pack is so handy. Each mask is folded flat and individually packaged, making it perfect to toss into pocket, purse, glove compartment, briefcase, anywhere. The masks themselves are flexible and easy to adjust to fit. The nose piece is soft, malleable, and comfortable. The ear straps are a very soft elastic fabric that has a clip at the loop which makes it easy to adjust the fit from upper or lower sections. For example, if you want a bit closer more shaped fit to the chin you draw the lower portion further through the clip until you find comfortable placement. Across the cheekbones you would adjust the top of the ear loop to tighten or ease the fit. The mask fabric is soft, easy to breathe through and speak behind. These shaped masks are not the least bit bulky in fit or appearance. I highly recommend the Semask KN95 Adjustable Masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy these. They are not at all a real N95 mask
reviews.reviewText: This is THE most ridiculously THIN mask. DO NOT buy them. 5 layers my butt. I didn't even take 1 out of the package. They it felt flimsier than the free ones they have in hospitals & medical facilities. go into medical facilities. AND they're not returnable. Shame on me for not noticing that. Just I've never had a single item thru Prime that I wasn't able to return. NOT all at happy.
